overview: The 40-years-old swedish office worker Freya Hidalgo, a mother in the middle of a crisis in her life, has to fight through losses and fears. Her 50-years-old husband, Santiago Hidalgo, a born argentinian man, no longer feels intimacy with his wife. Their 18-years-old son Lucas is in the middle of this bad conflict, but it will release unimagined feelings!
title: The Hidalgos
